content: the sugarloaf mountain dog snood is a nod to one of my favorite hiking places in arkansas the ridges and valleys made by the addictive front post/ back post double crochets remind me of this beautiful mountain as the mama of a floppy-eared boy you know it s only natural that i made him his hat so he can match the family while aerating his ears tada behold the sugarloaf mountain dog snood the snood is constructed in one big circular tube to accommodate your pet s head size you ll want it to fit pretty snug to keep it from slipping off but loose enough to be comfortable for your fuzzy friend in this pattern you ll find a written pattern featuring five different sizes tips and up-close picture tutorials of certain techniques
